channel.title: My "stock market" idea (cont.) Rep++
channel.description:
Okay, so i've got my stock market idea finished other than the very last part.
So far I have the NPC that sell the stock(s) for the correct price the stock is worth.
Now I need to create an interface that looks SOMEWHAT like a stock ticker.
I want it to look something like this.. [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/or1myx.png[/img]
I want it to be see through if it can be and small just like in the picture.
So a player can click on the NPC and see the CURRENT stock vales at any given time.
PROBLEM SOLVED interface being made with "RuneScape 2 Interface Creator"
